transArray.content: 5 points of praise, clean and simple, and there is also a robot to deliver food! Travel is also convenient

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. As a comfortable brand of Huazhu, we attach great importance to the stay experience of all guests. We are extremely honored that you are happy to stay here, and thank you for your review of our room. In order to ensure hygiene, the hotel is disinfecting and cleaning every day, and the hotel has also strengthened intelligent "contactless" services. During the stay, items required will be delivered to the room by robots, ensuring that the robots will be disinfected again after each use. Ensuring your travel safety and protecting the "peace of mind" and "safety" of every guest are our consistent and important missions. All hotel staff look forward to your every stay and wish you a happy holiday! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
